title: Bill Clinton Says He 'Never Said A Bad Word About Senator Obama,' At mtvU's First 'Editorial Board'
text: The Challenge: Vets & New Threats Wed 8/7c Sixteen veterans set their egos aside and team up with 16 newcomers on all-new episodes of The Challenge: Vets & New Threats. Caught in the Act: Unfaithful Trailer Tues 8/7c Don't sleep on Tami Roman as she and her team confront shameless cheaters, liars and no-good lovers. Ridiculousness Nightly on MTV Host Rob Dyrdek is joined by Steelo Brim and more to judge and crack jokes about outrageous and chaotic videos from across the internet and beyond. New Episode Every Wed Fifteen artists from around the world represent their hometowns and unique cultures on an all-new season. Only in Theatres Nov 14 Glen Powell stars as a factory worker determined to outwit a televised game of survival in this new Stephen King adaptation.
